article_title: Budget Deal Underscores Danger Of Relying On Social Security For Retirement Income

article_metadata.author: Great Speculations

og.description: The seemingly lack of available resources available for funding a growing social security and Medicare benefit programs, as demonstrated by the recent budget deal, is a real nightmare for the elderly as Social Security and Medicare could run short of money, threatening across-the-board cuts to promised benefits, leaving elderly Americans vulnerable.
